TASK: Craft an item of type: grindstone
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "fire_coral", "quantity": 25, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 13, "index": 16}, {"type": "brown_mushroom", "quantity": 63, "index": 18}, {"type": "stone_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 10, "index": 21}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 20, "index": 23}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 14, "index": 41}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 17, "index": 42}, {"type": "chicken_spawn_egg", "quantity": 53, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a grindstone, I need to first craft jungle_planks. To craft jungle_planks, I need to place a stripped_jungle_wood in the crafting table. The stripped_jungle_wood is at slot 32, so I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4
